bioghist.p: Barbara L. Kevles graduated from Bryn Mawr College in 1962. She was an author and journalist. Her articles and interviews were published in Working Woman, the Paris Review, the Village Voice, Seventeen, Marie Claire, and Ladies Home Journal. She interviewed Joan Baez, Judy Collins, Shirley Temple Black, Eunice Kennedy Shriver, Edith Head, Liv Ullman, and many other celebrities.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of manuscripts, notes, tapes, and transcriptions of Kevles's interviews. Also included are clippings, correspondence, records of copyright ownership and financial matters, and documentation of other authors' use of her interview materials.
